meta.title: My Crypto Heroes (MCH, マイクリ) | Crypto game from Japan!
meta.description: My Crypto Heroes (MCH) -where your time and passion will become your assets. Get great extensions and Land through collecting/training historical Heroes! Can be played without gas fee.

top.leadMessage: Your time and passion will become assets.
top.signIn: If you play {type} with your {message}, you can't use same account. Are you sure to log in?
top.signInWarning: * To play all contents of My Crypto Heroes you need a wallet app. Please check the FAQ for details.
top.stop: 【Announcement】New user registraion is stopped now to take measures against malicious BOT.

welcome.name: What's your name in Crypto World?
welcome.inviteCode: Input your Invite Code (if you have)

top.guide: Learn how to play My Crypto Heroes

title: What is
My Crypto Heroes?
intro.body: My Crypto Heroes is an RPG battle game that is built on the Ethereum blockchain. Play with historical inspired heroes, go on quests to find rare items, and battle against other players for rewards and fame.

pve.title: PvE Mode
pve.body: Send your heroes into dungeons to collect EXP and find rare items, called Original Extensions (ERC-721 token). EXP can be used to level up your assets.

pvp.title: PvP Mode
pvp.body: Fight other players in competitive tournaments, tailored to different player strengths. Top players earn Original Extensions (ERC-721) and eternal fame.

jobs.title: Farmer
jobs.body: Farmers go on quests to level up heroes and find rare items. Sell your loot on the market to earn GUM, the currency of MCH.

jobs.title: Warrior
jobs.body: Warriors fight in PvP battles for rare items and fame. Prove your skill in regular tournaments, Land vs. Land battles, and custom arenas.

jobs.title: Creator
jobs.body: Are you one of the creative kind? Sell your self-made hero skins on the art market for GUM. Or get creative in your own tournament modes.

jobs.title: Trader
jobs.body: Traders use the in-game market to earn GUM. They buy the supply of farmers and equip warriors before they send their heroes into battle.

hero.title: Heroes
hero.body: Each hero with the rarity Uncommon or higher is an ERC-721 token. This means that you own the token and can sell it on 3rd party platforms like OpenSea.

items.title: Items
items.body: Each unique item, called Original Extensions, is an ERC-721 token too. You will find them through fighting in quests or competing in tournaments.

dapper.title: For Most Players: Dapper Extension
dapper.body: Easy to use wallet, great design, and simple onboarding. Recommended for users who don't want to deal with private keys and Gas fees.

metamask.title: For Advanced Players: MetaMask Extension
metamask.body: Most used wallet for Ethereum dapps. Lots of features and flexibility. Recommended for users that are familiar with dapps.

reset.warning: This action will reset this team to its initial state. Is it OK?

referral.description:
share your promo code and get 10% of the paid ETH in GUM!
Every time player join through your invite code pay ETH to purchase gum, 5% equivalent amount of ETH will be distributed to you. (During the campaign, it may be expanded to “equivalent to 10%” etc.)
referral.gift:
Promo code Gift
Your friends who use your promo code can get replica Hero "Brothers Grimm".
referral.warning: * "Sign in" by "Normal Play with Wallet" is necessary. In the case of "Trial Play with Google", "Invitation Code" is not displayed.
referral.shareText: #MyCryptoHeroes, Your time and passion will become assets. ‪Join Japanese authentic “blockchain RPG” which can be played without cryptocurrency, and even wallets!!‬
referral.afterShareText: Invitation code: {inviteCode} Get special Hero with code!

approve.description: To use your heroes, you need to finish two steps. 1st, Transfer Preparation. 2nd, Transfer to Crypto World.
approve.extensiondescription: To use your extensions, you need to finish two steps. 1st, Transfer Preparation. 2nd, Transfer to Crypto World.

assetId.heroLock: Using this hero now. Remove this from your team and duel team.
assetId.extensionLock: Using this extension now. Remove this from your team and duel team.

withdrawWarning.description: You can use your assets in Ethereum when you transfer your assets to Ethereum Network.
withdrawWarning.1: It will cost {gum} GUM for transferring it to Ethereum network.
withdrawWarning.3: Extension has to be more than Lv.2 and set Nickname to transfer
withdrawWarning.4: Hero has to be more than Lv.2 and art-edited to transfer
withdrawWarning.5: It takes about 20 mins for trasfer, but it takes more than several hours owing to Ethereum transaction traffic.
withdrawWarning.6:
You can't transfer your assets(Hero / Extension) which have not passed 24 hours since you get※1 or use※2 them in battle last time.
※1 get: Purchase, Quest, Reward, Trade, Transfer to Crypto World
※2 use in battle: Official Duel Cup, Arena, Land Battle, Raid

warning.title: Art edit rules and notes
list: You can do Art-edit as much as you want for a hero, but you need to pay 40 GUM (Game Users Money) from the second time.
You can set previous art including default one without GUM fee. However passive skill and growth tendency will be remained.
Images exactly the same as those registered in Art-edit in the past can not be used in Art-edit.
Do not use pictures that infringe copyright or images that are against public order and morality.
Attention on using Art-edit is stated in Article 11 of the following terms of service.
We guarantee that you own copyright of art that you registered with Art-edit.
We will use the registered art only for MCH game and promotional use.
Images uploaded with Art-edit are managed decentralizedly using IPFS which is a distributed file system.
For edited images, only the display in MCH is changed. On external services such as opensea, the initial image is displayed even after editing.
warning.cost: You need to pay 40 GUM (Game Users Money) from the second time. Is it OK?

nickname.title: Set Nickname
nickname.confirm1: Are you sure to set Nickname as
nickname.warning1: *You can set Nickname only once you get the extension.
nickname.warning2: It costs 100 GUM, if this extension has been already set Nickname

refreshParam.confirm1: Are you sure to consume {ce} CE and change parameter growth trend?
refreshParam.confirm2: Once you execute this, you can never get back previous parameter growth trend

node.warning: Up to {challengeLimit} quests can be played per day.

faq.mail: Inquiry by e-mail / report of misbehavior

land.title: Land
land.settingG5: Battle Order Of Knights In Flag Battle (King/G5 Only)
land.detail1: If you have a landsector, you can become a lord of the land. And you can dedicate to Cryptid of the land and quest its land node. Also you can withdraw landlord reward.
land.detail2: When you send your landsector for its first time, you need to set name and art edit.

join.2: Once you choose it you can not leave until the next preparatory period
join.3: You will no longer be able to turn Free Agent this season.
join.title: Join Land

detail.already:
You can change your land only once during the preparation period of every land battle season.
You can not belong to any lands until the next preparation period, even if you leave your land and become Independent.
detail.new:
When you belong to land, your hero can get stronger owing to Cryptid and you can entry land battle.
You can only change once every season.
detail.community:
Sometimes, King and Maestros run campains or supports users
Let's check community before deciding your land.

leave.1: Leave the land and become Independent
leave.2: Once you leave this land and become Independent, you can not belong to any lands until the next preparation period
leave.3: You can not join any lands till next season. Are you sure to leave?

freeAgentPool.headline: Dedicate to Free Agent GUM Pool
freeAgentPool.1: Support your Land with GUM to hire Knights.
freeAgentPool.2: The dedicated GUM can be used by the King to purchase Knights from other Lands for Land Battle.

freeAgent.hasDeclared: Declared to be a Free Agent for {gum} GUM
freeAgent.notKnight: Can't declare Free Agent - Knights only

confirm.declare: Are you sure to become a Free Agent at a price of {gum} GUM?
confirm.cancelDeclared: Are you sure to cancel the Free Agent declaration?
confirm.receive: Are you sure to hire this Free Agent to your Land for {gum} GUM?

landBattle.title: Land Battle
landBattle.detail:
Land Battle consists of 'Knight Battle(1-5)', 'Knight Battle-G5' and 'Flag Battle'.
Knights can get a part of land profit, and G5 can join flag battle(fight with G5 of other lands) as representatives.

descriptions.g5: This battle decides the 5 Knights (G5) who will represent each Land in Flag Battle. Only the Knight Class participates in this battle. G5 Knights will be decided by the Achievement Points ranking at the end of this Battle.

pledge.title: Pledge for fair play
pledge.body: I will play fair, conforming to the terms of use and Land-battle rules.
pledge.warnings: In the Land Battle you need to organize a dedicated team.

heroRarityCost.title: Hero Rarity Cost
heroRarityCost.description: "Hero Realty Cost" has been set for the rarealities "Novice", "common", "Uncomon", "Rare", "Epic" and "Legendary" of heroes. For this land battle, the team needs to be organized so that the sum of the team's hero costs falls within the specified value.

cryptid.title: Cryptid
cryptid.detail:
Cryptid is a like guardian angel for each Land.
Your Team can get stronger with your dedication of NIE and EMA

warnings.hero: Note: Your hero's level might decrease according to the amount of CE you choose to dedicate.
warnings.extension: Note: Your extension's level might decrease according to the amount of CE you choose to dedicate.

warnings: Note: You will lose ownership of the original extensions you dedicate. You will not be able to use them anymore. Is this okay?

warnings.hero: All your dedicated replica heroes will be burned.
warnings.extension: All your dedicated replica extensions will be burned.

emaEffects.title: EMA Effects
emaEffects.detail:
You can get EMA effects from your dedication of Original Extensions(EMA).
The effect of EMA is applied at the time of battle of each night battle / flag battle / quest / raid battle (in principle, official duel cup has no effect)

dedicate.emaDescription: Extensions must have a Nickname set and can't be used in your team

notice.text: Our latest ecosystem update removed LAB and introduced TOKU. It is a Proof of Play (PoP) system that rewards active quest farmers with Heroes, Extensions, and GUM.

modal.explainer: Dedicate your CE to your Land Cryptid and collect Toku Points.

toku.inPrep: In Preparation - TOKU Treasure will be released soon

shop.comment: It takes 2 mins to recieve GUM after buying GUM.
shop.wallet: You need to install Ethereum Wallet to buy GUM

airdrop.comment: It takes several minitues to receive assets, according to Ethereum network traffic.
airdrop.wallet: You need to install Ethereum Wallet to airdrop

shop.gumgumup: GUMGUMUP campaign now! 20% Extra GUM & 1 in 34 ETH back!!

about.title: About MCH Prime
about.lead: MCH Prime you will receive following benefits for 30 days.
list: Limited-time special offer: You can get Novice Hero 'Sun Shangxiang'
Double the exp(CE) from quest node
Daily Bonus
Expanding the number of teams from 3 to 6
Limited Node only for Prime Users
Continuity available on node failure
Early access to hosted features of the Public Arena
1 replica hero (A or more) is granted for every prime update (* enrollment after withdrawal is not eligible)
Additional Bonus for TOKU Treasure
about.dailybonus3: ※ Small amount of ETH is required as a gas fee.
about.continue: Available up to 5 times in approximately 24 hours

leftDays.warning: You can purchase that right again from {updatableRemainingDays} days before the end

prime.notes: If you buy with ETH, your status is reflected in 5-10 mins after successing the transaction.

discription: The Automatic Update setting can be turned ON/OFF at any time. The Automatic Update will be ON if you join with checking the box below.
Automatic Update is purchased with GUM ({primePriceWithGum} GUM). If there is not enough GUM at Automatic Update, Automatic Update is disabled.
After the remaining period of prime time is 72 hours or less, it will be automatically renewed.

prime.purchase: Purchase MCH Prime from {primePrice}. Are you sure?

modal.text: Cancel MCH Prime at {date} and receive {gum} GUM refund

novice.1: Novice Hero is in game hero.
novice.2: Unable to sell and transfer to Ethereum Network.

replica.1: Replicas can be used for 7 days after they were set up in a team for the first time. It will become Lv. 1 afterwards. Please be careful.
replica.2: In addition, please read details before purchase.
replica.3: The pickup will be automatically updated every day at UTC 0:00.
replica.5: GUM and purchase this replica hero?
replica.refresh: Would you consume {gum} GUM and refresh the replica hero pickup?
regendaryTrial: The trial campaign runs from July 22th to July 26th, and the campaign’s Legendary Replica Hero (Alexander/Qin Shi Huang /Minamoto Yoshitsune) has an Lv of 100. Note that the Lv will decrease to 70 by July 26th (Planned around UTC 6:00 July 26th) regardless of whether it is used or not.

The passive skill effectiveness and params of the new Legendary Hero is currently being adjusted and subject to change without notice. The actual selling of Legendary Heroes reflects the adjusted skills and params.(Updated at UTC 1:43pm July 22nd)
During the campaign period, the Replica Hero lineup cannot be refreshed arbitrarily.
During the campaign, your purchase status is refreshed at UTC 0:00 o’clock every morning.

body.finished: Land Pre-sale application acceptance period has ended.
body.lead: Pre-sale will be a "bulk sale" premised on bulk purchase of the country, mainly for business operators and large-lot investors (imagine like “buy one building” for apartment sales, for example)
list: Price: 500ETH/Land
Number of Lands to be sold: 4 countries (in 9)
Period: 2/13 Wednesday 7:00~2/18 6:00 UTC( winners will be chosen on 2/19)
We will do KYC(Know Your Client. Confirm your identification), and once you agree to purchase the land, we will make the agreement with each holder.

warning.p: * Please check the following Medium article and apply after understanding the content of Land Pre-sale.

pledge.content: I have already checked "Terms of service" and "Land Crowd-sale"

trade.rule1: 10% of the price will be added to the price automatically as a commission fee.
trade.rule2: The rate of the price dropping is calculated automatically. It is set to decrease by 20% of the gap between the 'Starting Price' and 'Ending Price' a day. So in 5 days, the price will drop to the 'Ending Price'.
trade.rule3: Note: The item (heroes and/or extensions) must be unequipped to sell. Likewise, heroes and/or extensions can't be withdrawn while it has been listed for sale (within 5 days) or you decide to cancel the listing.
trade.rule4: It is possible to exhibit up to 100 times a day.
trade.rule5: There is a lower limit for "Start Price" and "End Price". You can set 100 GUM or more for "Start Price" and 10 GUM or more for "End Price".
trade.rule6:
You can't transfer your assets(Hero / Extension) which have not passed 24 hours since you get※1 or use※2 them in battle last time.
※1 get: Purchase, Quest, Reward, Trade, Transfer to Crypto World
※2 use in battle: Official Duel Cup, Arena, Land Battle, Raid
trade.rule7: You can see your asset in trading list after 1 mins since you sell your asset.
trade.rule8: If a copied art is reported by its original creator, we will stop listing the copied art. In the case of repetitive infringement, we will carry out strict measures (such as suspending accounts, reverting art sale transactions, and so on).

absorb.disclaimer: Your selected extensions will be absorbed. Are you sure to continue?

closeWarning.text: You have an unfinished quest. Do you want to continue where you left off?

modal.text: Pay {gum} GUM to recharge each hero's stamina to {stamina}.

continue.title: Revive
continue.text: As part of your MCH Prime subscription, you can revive your party for up to {count} times per day for free.

help.title: About Revive
help.body: As part of your MCH Prime subscription, you can revive your party for up to {count} times per day for free. Your Revive count gets reset back to {count} every day at 0:00(UTC). Unused Revives will not carry over to the next day.

walletModal.1: Install browser extension to access blockchain game.
walletModal.3: For more details on how to use METAMASK
walletModal.5: Download Mobile browser application with wallet function
walletModal.7: You can connet your wallet(METAMASK) in account page.

land.confirm: You purchase "Land: {landName} - {landRarity}" for {price} GUM. Is it OK?

duel.warning: Up to {challengeLimit} battles can be played per day.
duel.twitter: Come on! Let's fight with my Heroes team!

join.nineBattle: Select 9 heroes for your 9on9 Battle Team:
join.pledgeContent: I will play fair, comforming to the terms of use and Official Duel Cup rules.
join.warning: * Your account will be banned and your trophies and Winners Point will be deprivationd if you violate terms of use or Official Duel Cup rules.

duel.title: Duel Cup

overheat.title: Overheated Heroes
overheat.subtitle: (-50% base stats)
overheat.explanation: We enable the new mechanic Overheated Heroes during the last 5 hours of the tournament. Criteria for a hero to overheat: Hero is played in more than 50% of battles AND is among the top 3 most winning heroes of that segment. Overheated heroes have their base stats cut in half.

arena.title: Arena
arena.description: Fight other players in exclusive tournaments. Got a code? Enter it below to join.
arena.confirmJoin: Would you like to join this Arena? You can only join one Arena at a time.
arena.tooLate: Sorry, you're too late. This arena has already started or has been cancelled.
arena.noNineTeam: You have not initiated your 9on9 team yet. Please initiate your 9on9 team and join the arena afterwards.
arena.confirmCancelArena: Are you sure to officially cancel this Arena? You cannot undo this action.
arena.confirmLeaveArena: Are you sure to leave this Arena?
arena.inviteOthers: Invite others to fight in your Arena

arenaView.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop the move icon to change the order or switch teams. If a team exceeds 5 players, player 6 will be moved to the other team.
arenaView.movedToIce: Moved Team Fire's player 6 to Team Ice
arenaView.movedToFire: Moved Team Ice's player 6 to Team Fire

createArenaModal.title: Arena Title
createArenaModal.createNineError: Create your 9on9 Team before hosting 9on9 Arena

league.text1: Every player fights against every other player once.
league.text2: Each win gets 3 points, draw 1 point, and loss 0 points.
league.text3: The player with the most points at the end of the tournament wins.
league.text4: A maximum of 12 players can join the arena.

team.text1: There are two teams with an ordered list of max. 5 players each.
team.text2: Each respective first players start with the first battle.
team.text3: The winner will continue to battle the next player from the opponent team. (similar to Land Flag Battle)
team.text4: A maximum of 10 players can join the arena.
team.text5: Each player can change the order of players.

raid.title: Raid
warning: Note that Hero's level might be decreased according to the amount of CE you choose.
You will get 1 treasure box every time the amount of damage reaches to multiples of 1500.
raid.reflectInInventory: If there are a large number of acquisitions, it may take time to reflect in the inventory
raid.detail:
Let's join and fight with Raid Boss!
You can join Raid battle by consuming CE(not stamina!), but be careful to use CE because your heroes may be leveled down!

artGallery.selectHero: Select Hero to set this Art

warning: If a copied art is reported by its original creator, we will stop listing the copied art.

reportModal.agree: I agree to the following notes

welcome.title: マイクリにようこそ!!
welcome.1: この世界で得たヒーロー、アイテム（エクステンション）はあなたの資産になります。
welcome.2: まずはクエストをやってみましょう
welcome.3: クエストで経験値(クリプトエナジー)を獲得できます。また、エネミーがアイテム(エクステンション)をドロップすることがあります。

quest.title: Quest
quest.1: Lets try quest first!, Choose one of nodes
quest.2:
Choose Lv of node, and your team. Each hero has Hero stamina, that is shown on the right side of red star.
And the figure next to the blue start shows the consumption of Hero Stamina for the node.
Hero Stamina will be regenerated as time passing.
quest.3:
The cube (inside of red rectangle) shows the amount of Crypto Energy(CE) you acquired through the node.
 Level of heroes and original extensions will go up as you get certain amount of CE.
There is a either Original or Replica extension inside of the chest box(inside of blue rectangle)
There are bronze, silver and gold chests.
Note that you won’t receive CE and chests if you can’t win all three battles.

team.title: Team
team.1: You can organize your team in this tab. When you press team 1,
team.2: スキル「休む」はマイクリ独自の機能、'アートエディット'によって変化します。
team.3: アートエディットはインベントリのヒーロー詳細画面から実行できます。
team.4: アートエディット詳細
team.5: 最強のチームをつくり、クリプトワールドを制覇しよう！

ranking.title: To enjoy MCH more!
ranking.1: You might not get the reward of Ranking Match #2
ranking.2: You must connect your ETH wallet to get the reward
ranking.3: You must finish 'connect to Wallet' to receive the reward of Ranking Match #2

merit.1: If you connet to Wallet successfully, you can

wallet.2: 'connet to Wallet' is a function that allows your current Google account to use Ethereum
wallet.3: You must use your laptop and Google Chrome to 'connect to Wallet'
wallet.4: Install wallet extension to your laptop and join Ranking Match #2!

land.1: This page describes detail of each land.
land.2: You can see King and Maestros and the policy of usage of land revenue share.
land.3: Sometimes, each land has its own campaign in its community or twitter.
land.4: You can join one of the lands and become citizen of it.
land.5: You have to be careful to choose one of them, because you can change your land status only once for one season of land battle.
land.6: You can transfer to another land or become Independent in the preparation period of next season of land battle.
land.7:
You can change your land status('Join', 'Transfer', or 'Become Independent) only once in preparation period.
Check detail of lands and community, choose one carefully.

connect.title: Connet to Wallet
connect.requirement: Laptop and specific browser Google Chrome, Firefox, Opera

sentence.1: Use Browser Extension for Blockchain Game
sentence.4: Click the icon at the upper right of the browser
sentence.5: Set the wallet  ※You must backup important keys. And also never share them.
sentence.7: Log in with your current Googl account.
sentence.8: Click the Account Setting in submenu
sentence.10: お使いのスマートフォンでも、Wallet機能付きブラウザアプリをダウンロードしていただきimport作業をすることで、デイリーボーナスやGUM購入が可能性になります。
sentence.11: 詳細はこちら(外部サイト)

browser.1: You may use browser without METAMASK or METAMASK is signed out.
browser.2: Please use browser with METAMASK(such as Chrome), or sign in to METAMASK.

mobile.2: You can buy GUM and get Daily Bonus if you use Ethereum.

we decided to lock your account due to violation of section 14 of terms and policies. Please read terms and services to check which rule you are against.

mch-support@doublejump.tokyo

continuousLogin.9: You will get Replica Hero RepA in {day} Days!
